db:select.doc:name: Query User from Database
db:select.db:sql: SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate FROM User WHERE Email = :email

ee:transform.doc:name: Set Id and LastModifiedDate from matching user

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload ++ { IdDB: if(vars.IdDateInDB != null) vars.IdDateInDB[0].Id else null, LastModifiedDateDB: if(vars.IdDateInDB != null) vars.IdDateInDB[0].LastModifiedDate else null }

ee:transform.doc:name: map SFDC User to DB User

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { Name : $.Name, Username : $.Username, FirstName : $.FirstName, LastName : $.LastName, Alias : $.Alias, CommunityNickname : $.CommunityNickname, Email : $.Email, EmailEncodingKey : $.EmailEncodingKey, LanguageLocaleKey : $.LanguageLocaleKey, LocaleSidKey : $.LocaleSidKey, (ProfileId : if (vars.sfdc2dbProfilesMap == "false") $.ProfileId else vars.sfdc2dbProfilesMap[($.ProfileId)]), TimeZoneSidKey : $.TimeZoneSidKey }

db:bulk-insert.doc:name: Bulk insert Users to Database
db:bulk-insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO User( Username, FirstName, LastName, Alias, CommunityNickname, Email, EmailEncodingKey, LanguageLocaleKey, LocaleSidKey, ProfileId, TimeZoneSidKey, LastModifiedById, LastModifiedDate ) VALUES ( :Username, :FirstName, :LastName, :Alias, :CommunityNickname, :Email, :EmailEncodingKey, :LanguageLocaleKey, :LocaleSidKey, :ProfileId, :TimeZoneSidKey, CURRENT_USER(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

ee:transform.doc:name: map SFDC User to DB User

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { Id : $.IdDB, Username : $.Username, FirstName : $.FirstName, LastName : $.LastName, Alias : $.Alias, CommunityNickname : $.CommunityNickname, Email : $.Email, EmailEncodingKey : $.EmailEncodingKey, LanguageLocaleKey : $.LanguageLocaleKey, LocaleSidKey : $.LocaleSidKey, (ProfileId : if (vars.sfdc2dbProfilesMap == "false") $.ProfileId else vars.sfdc2dbProfilesMap[($.ProfileId)]), TimeZoneSidKey : $.TimeZoneSidKey }

db:bulk-update.doc:name: Bulk update users in Database
db:bulk-update.db:sql: UPDATE User SET Username = :Username, FirstName = :FirstName, LastName = :LastName, Alias = :Alias, CommunityNickname = :CommunityNickname, Email = :Email, EmailEncodingKey = :EmailEncodingKey, LanguageLocaleKey = :LanguageLocaleKey, LocaleSidKey = :LocaleSidKey, ProfileId = :ProfileId, TimeZoneSidKey = :TimeZoneSidKey, LastModifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), LastModifiedById = CURRENT_USER() WHERE Id = :Id

salesforce:query-single.doc:name: Query User from Salesforce
salesforce:query-single.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate FROM User WHERE Email = ':email'

ee:transform.doc:name: Set Id and LastModifiedDate from matching user

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload ++ { (Id: vars.IdDateInSalesforce.Id) if vars.IdDateInSalesforce.Id != null, (LastModifiedDateSFDC: vars.IdDateInSalesforce.LastModifiedDate) if vars.IdDateInSalesforce.LastModifiedDate != null }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload map { (Id :$.IdDB) if ($.IdDB != null), Username: $.Username, FirstName: $.FirstName, LastName : $.LastName, Alias : $.Alias, CommunityNickname : $.CommunityNickname, Email : $.Email, EmailEncodingKey : $.EmailEncodingKey, LanguageLocaleKey : $.LanguageLocaleKey, LocaleSidKey : $.LocaleSidKey, (ProfileId : if (vars.db2sfdcProfilesMap == "false") $.ProfileId else vars.db2sfdcProfilesMap[($.ProfileId)]), TimeZoneSidKey : $.TimeZoneSidKey }
